## Extension.CompilerPlugin interface

Apply plugin interface

Signature:

```typescript
export interface CompilerPlugin<Plugin = any, Options = Record<string, any>> extends Module
```

Extends: [Module](/api/bud-framework/module)

## Remarks

Compatible with Webpack's plugin interface

## Properties

| Property                                                    | Type                                                                                                                        | Description                                                              |
